name: Sad Friend Sim (Take Care Jam)
description:
Made as a part of Take Care Jam in Montreal.

It's a sad animal friend! Works best on touch devices. Refresh to get some different faces for your creature (there's not a ton of variety yet, but it's there). You have to perpetually pet it and take care of it. It kind of... doesn't get better. Prototype for something else, maybe tamagotchi-ish!
